snippet.title: Persona5：The Phantom X CBT2 Awakening Test Trailer
snippet.description:
This time, we have brought a brand new story and stage to all the players, and sincerely invite you to experience brand new adventures and fetters.

In the fierce collision between reality and metaverse, are you ready to awaken the power to control your own hearts?

Persona5：The Phantom X CBT2 Awakening Test scheduled for August 8th！
Qualifications for testing are currently being recruited.
The journey is about to begin, come join us!

#P5X #Persona5ThePhantomX #PerfectWorldGames
